episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics, including the unique reproductive anatomy of spiny anteaters, a peculiar real estate deal involving a centenarian, the transformation of a record-breaking hailstone into margaritas, and the surprising amount of cocaine found in London's sewage.

facts.fact: Spiny anteaters only use half their penis during sex.

In the 1960s, a 47-year-old man paid a 90-year-old woman 2,500 francs a month so that he could own her apartment when she passed away. Unfortunately for him, she outlived him by not dying and making it to be 122 years old.
The largest hailstone in Texan history was broken up by locals and turned into margaritas.
The average Londoner poos out 1/100th of a line of cocaine every weekend.
